title: Land on the updated Barrancabermeja Airport
description:
YariguÃ­es Airport (Spanish: Aeropuerto YariguÃ­es, IATA: EJA, ICAO: SKEJ) serves the city of Barrancabermeja in Colombia's Santander Department. Located 6 kilometers (3.7 mi) southeast of the city, the airport underwent renovations in 2013, costing $13 million pesos. The Colombian President, Juan Manuel Santos, attended the inauguration of the updated facilities.

Despite its modest size, the airport boasts several improvements, including enhanced night lighting, nearby updates, ground vehicle enhancements, and the addition of static aircraft.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
